abstract: Verizon Communications is selling its California, Florida and Texas wireline units to Frontier Communications for $9.9 billion; Frontier is also taking on $600 million in debt.
lead_paragraph: The company says it wants to concentrate on the East Coast wireline business and will focus on expanding its FiOS broadband and high-speed Internet business in that region.

headline.main: Verizon Sells Wireline Business in Three States to Frontier
headline.print_headline: Verizon Sells Wireline Business in Three States to Frontier

snippet: The company says it wants to concentrate on the East Coast wireline business and will focus on expanding its FiOS broadband and high-speed Internet business in that region.
